collection.name: Eclipse IDE
collection.desc: A project aiming to provide a universal toolset for development

collection.name: JavaScript Performance playground
collection.desc: jsPerf aims to provide an easy way to create and share test cases, comparing the performance of different JavaScript snippets by running benchmarks

collection.name: Sublime Text Editor
collection.desc: A sophisticated text editor for code, markup and prose comprised with the slick user interface, extraordinary features and amazing performance.

collection.name: JSFiddle
collection.desc: An online playground for your JavaScript, HTML, CSS

collection.name: JSApp.US
collection.desc: A node.js Hosting Provider (Similar to jsfiddle for Node.js programs)

collection.name: Visual Event
collection.desc: Open source Javascript bookmarklet which provides debugging information about events that have been attached to DOM elements

collection.name: Firebug - Firefox addon for debugging
collection.desc: Web development and debugging tool

collection.name: JSLint
collection.desc: Code Quality Tool

collection.name: JSHint
collection.desc: A community-driven tool to detect errors and potential problems in JavaScript code and to enforce your team's coding conventions

collection.name: YUI Compressor
collection.desc: JavaScript and CSS Compressor

collection.name: CodePen
collection.desc: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code editor right in your browser with instant previews of the code you see and write. It's great for showing off your work and seeing what amazing things other people are doing with the web.

collection.name: Plato
collection.desc: JavaScript source code visualization, static analysis, and complexity tool

collection.name: Grunt
collection.desc: The JavaScript Task Runner. Automate repetitive tasks like minification, compilation, unit testing, linting, etc.

collection.name: Yeoman
collection.desc: A collection of tools and best practices working in harmony to make developing for the web even better

collection.name: Bower
collection.desc: A package manager for the web, created at Twitter

collection.name: RegExper
collection.desc: Regular Expression Visualization Site

collection.name: UglifyJS
collection.desc: JavaScript parser / mangler / compressor / beautifier library for NodeJS

collection.name: YUIDoc
collection.desc: A Node.js application that generates API documentation from comments in source

collection.name: JSDoc
collection.desc: An API documentation generator for JavaScript.

collection.name: Docco
collection.desc: A quick-and-dirty documentation generator, written in Literate CoffeeScript

collection.name: WebStorm
collection.desc: JavaScript IDE with refactorings, code completion and on-the-fly code analysis

collection.name: WAVE - Web Accessibility Evaluation Tool
collection.desc: A tool to check accessibility of web pages

collection.name: Gulp.js
collection.desc: The streaming build system

collection.name: Brackets (code editor)
collection.desc: An open source code editor for HTML, CSS and JavaScript written in JavaScript, HTML and CSS

collection.name: Emscripten
collection.desc: An LLVM-to-JavaScript compiler. It takes LLVM bitcode - which can be generated from C/C++ or any other language that can be converted into LLVM - and compiles that into JavaScript
